title: TOWIE's Olivia Attwood and Chloe Sims join their castmates to shoot new scenes for reality show
text:
With Halloween swiftly approaching, the TOWIE were seen sporting an array of eye-catching costumes as they attended various parties over the past few days.

But it was back to work for Olivia Attwood and Chloe Sims on Monday, as they joined their castmates in Essex to shoot new scenes for their long-running reality show.

Olivia, 28 – who recently announced her engagement to Bradley Dack – was wrapped up for her day before cameras, stepping out in a cream hoodie under a plaid coat, which she teamed with ripped skinny jeans.

Back to work they go: (L-R) Olivia Attwood and Chloe Sims were spotted shooting scenes for TOWIE in Essex on Monday

Toting a pair of Chanel bags, the reality star wore her blonde locks in voluminous waves, while she highlighted her good looks with a rich palette of makeup.

Chloe, 36, went for a more dramatic look, teaming a black blazer with black pleather jogging bottoms and a plain white top.

Standing tall in a pair of heavy duty boots, the TV personality accessorised with an elaborately designed statement choker and oversized hoop earrings.

Wrapped up: Olivia, 28, was wrapped up for her day before cameras, stepping out in a cream hoodie under a plaid coat, which she teamed with ripped skinny jeans

Eye-catching style: Toting a pair of Chanel bags, the reality star wore her blonde locks in voluminous waves, while she highlighted her good looks with a rich palette of makeup

With her tresses tied back in a relaxed ponytail, mother-of-one Chloe blended in with her co-stars as she sported a generous serving of makeup.

Chloe made headlines a few weeks ago when she was seen leaving London hotspot Chiltern Firehouse in the company of Pamela Anderson's ex Adil Rami.

Throwing his support behind their romance, Chloe's pal Pete Wicks told MailOnline: ‘I wasn’t surprised, I knew she was going on a date. I know she had a good time.

'I think he lives in a different country so I don’t know when they’re planning on seeing each other again.’

Dramatic look: Chloe, 36, went for a more dramatic look, teaming a black blazer with black pleather jogging bottoms and a plain white top

Accessories: Standing tall in a pair of heavy duty boots, the TV personality accessorised with an elaborately designed statement choker and oversized hoop earrings

Tress-ed to impress: With her tresses tied back in a relaxed ponytail, mother-of-one Chloe blended in with her co-stars as she sported a generous serving of makeup

Adil parted ways with Pamela this summer following her allegations of 'mental abuse' and accusations of violence and cheating - all of which he has strenuously denied.

Meanwhile, Chloe has had a tough year after her ill-fated romance with co-star Dan Edgar left her heartbroken when he went crawling back to his ex Amber Turner.

Feeling like a protective big brother, Pete said: ‘Chloe deserves to be happy and whatever makes her happy, I’m there for.

No sibling rivalry here! Reality star Chloe was joined by her sisters (L-R) Frankie and Demi Sims

Staying in sync: The sisters kept their looks coordinated, with all of them stepping out in black

Structured looks: Each of the sisters wore structured jackets with different styles of trousers

Hair we go: The glam siblings added a pop of contrast with their brightly coloured hairstyles

Family first: TV star Chloe lovingly hugged her sisters as they posed for photographs together

‘I am quite protective over Chloe, she has been messed around a bit and she deserves all the happiness in the world. Hopefully, one day she’ll find her prince charming!’

Chloe and Pete recently had a psychic reading after the blonde became convinced they were soulmates and discovered they had supposedly known each other in their past lives.

But in this lifetime, romance is off the cards – despite the pair looking very cosy during a boozy night out earlier this month.

‘Right now me and Chloe are good friends and that’s the way we like it. If it’s not broke, don’t fix it’, Pete said.

Reporting for duty: Also on hand for the day of shooting in Essex was co-star Chloe Ross

Casually cool: She looked casually cool in ripped jeans and a white top under a grey coat

Shearling: Georgia Kousoulou joined the gang in a pink shearling jacket and ripped faded jeans

Warm beverages: The sister sat down for a chat over warm beverages as cameras rolled
